home.title: Arda Senturk
home.subtitle: React-Native Developer
home.description: I'm a passionate developer who loves creating beautiful, functional mobile applications. I specialize in React-Native, TypeScript, and modern mobile technologies to build exceptional user experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I have been involved in software development for approximately 15 years, and currently have multiple applications live on both the App Store and Play Store. I have been working as a React-Native Developer at a company for over 3 years, expanding my experience through various projects during this time.
about.description2: Throughout my career, I have participated in different projects and provided various training sessions. I have developed many different projects using React-Native, NestJS, NodeJS, Unity, and Swift languages. Each project has given me new perspectives and expanded my technology range.
about.description3: Currently, I am trying to improve myself in artificial intelligence with Python. My passion for continuous learning and discovering new technologies ensures that I always stay current and provide the best solutions in my projects.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in new opportunities and collaborations. Let's connect and discuss how we can work together!
contact.name: Name

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Mobile applications I developed with React-Native. Each one offers a solution to a different problem.

weightly.title: Weightly
weightly.description: Weight tracking and healthy living app. A modern mobile application that allows users to track their weight, set goals and make progress.

howWell.title: How Well?
howWell.description: Fun question-and-answer game that can be played among friends. Test how well you know each other and have a good time.
